commentaire: Today I am writing a report to police because anytime doesn‘t react on my messages and kept about 2400 eur without telling me ANYTHING. Just silence!
reponses: Bonjour, Je suis navrée de l'incident rencontré avec nos services.Nous vous invitons à patienter, votre dossier est en cours de traitement auprès du service compétent.Nous ne bloquons jamais nos utilisateurs sans raison valable : la majorité du temps, ces demandes sont nécessaires pour nous assurer du bon fonctionnement du compte et vérifier l'origine des fonds reçus. Bien entendu, si à la suite de ces recherches il s'avère qu'il s'agit d'une erreur de notre part, votre compte sera débloqué au plus vite. De plus, en raison de la réglementation, nous ne sommes pas toujours en mesure de partager les raisons du blocage de votre compte, y compris avec les personnes titulaires des-dits comptes.Cordialement, Michèle - Anytime
commentaire_text: today i am writing a report to police because anytime doesn t react on my messages and kept about 2400 eur without telling me anything. just silence

titre_com: Misleading Promises and Unreliable Service: My Qonto Experience in Italy
commentaire: I opened a Qonto account for my new startup in Milan, Italy, incorporated on August 1st. Qonto repeatedly assured me that their issues with Banca D'Italia wouldn't affect my account since I started the opening process before July 25th. This turned out to be completely false.While I managed to open the account and incorporate my company, Qonto recently informed me they couldn't activate ANY cards for my account due to their regulatory issues in Italy. This directly contradicts what they promised earlier, as evidenced by an email from their representative Alessandro, who stated:"The restrictions apply only to future customers, therefore the account opening process for TWINI S.R.L. is not impacted in any way."Now I'm left with a useless bank account, forced to transfer funds to a new bank and close this account as soon as possible. There's also a risk they might retain the currently deposited money, similar to what N26 did during a comparable situation in Italy.This feels like a bait-and-switch. Qonto told me one thing at the beginning and the opposite now. When I called them, they claimed they couldn't do anything about it and that the problem was beyond their control. The real issue is that they assured me the process would be smooth because I was before the deadline, only to completely change their stance a month later.Qonto's actions are deceptive and unprofessional. They're likely to face significant problems in Italy and lose substantial market share. I've decided to switch to Revolut instead.In conclusion, my experience with Qonto has been deeply disappointing. Their misleading promises and inability to provide basic banking services make them an unreliable choice for businesses in Italy. I strongly advise caution to anyone considering Qonto for their banking needs.
reponses: Ciao Davide,Abbiamo letto molto attentamente la recensione che ci hai lasciato.Qonto ha ricevuto un ordine da Banca d’Italia per migliorare le sue misure anti-riciclaggio nella sua filiale italiana. Questo ordine include un divieto temporaneo di onboarding per i nuovi clienti in Italia a partire dal 25 luglio 2024.Ci scusiamo per la poca chiarezza della comunicazione relativa alla restrizione dell'ordine di nuove carte, tuttavia ti confermiamo che al momento non è possibile procedere con tale funzionalità.Ti assicuriamo che stiamo lavorando diligentemente per rispettare tutte le normative vigenti e per minimizzare l'impatto sui nostri clienti.Un nostro agente si è già messo in contatto con te per proporti un gesto commerciale per scusarci dell'accaduto.Se hai bisogno di ulteriori chiarimenti o assistenza, non esitare a rispondere a questa email.Buona giornata
commentaire_text: i opened a qonto account for my new startup in milan, italy, incorporated on august 1st. qonto repeatedly assured me that their issues with banca d'italia wouldn't affect my account since i started the opening process before july 25th. this turned out to be completely false.while i managed to open the account and incorporate my company, qonto recently informed me they couldn't activate any cards for my account due to their regulatory issues in italy. this directly contradicts what they promised earlier, as evidenced by an email from their representative alessandro, who stated the restrictions apply only to future customers, therefore the account opening process for twini s.r.l. is not impacted in any way. now i'm left with a useless bank account, forced to transfer funds to a new bank and close this account as soon as possible. there's also a risk they might retain the currently deposited money, similar to what n26 did during a comparable situation in italy.this feels like a bait and switch. qonto told me one thing at the beginning and the opposite now. when i called them, they claimed they couldn't do anything about it and that the problem was beyond their control. the real issue is that they assured me the process would be smooth because i was before the deadline, only to completely change their stance a month later.qonto's actions are deceptive and unprofessional. they're likely to face significant problems in italy and lose substantial market share. i've decided to switch to revolut instead.in conclusion, my experience with qonto has been deeply disappointing. their misleading promises and inability to provide basic banking services make them an unreliable choice for businesses in italy. i strongly advise caution to anyone considering qonto for their banking needs.

commentaire: Not impressed at all by the way the bank tries to foist a different card on you, making your choice for you (with extra charges inevitable) in the announcement that the old one needs renewing. To revert to the same card, with which I am very happy, took half a dozen pages to view and answer questions. Hopeless, waste of my time.It should seek to target its customers instead. There was no way I was going to take up the new card---that was obvious through my spending and transfer history.Aaaaggghh.

titre_com: Charging 50% more now for the same service
commentaire: now they forced me to go to Qonto from PENTA. Now they charging for the same service 50% more. Before I paid 9,90€ for the basic package with sub accounts. Now they charging 19€ just for having sub accounts. it feels like we are cheated or tricked
reponses: Hello, thank you for your feedback.We have tried to reach you by phone to present the joining forces of PENTA with QONTO in details.Regarding your comment, our Smart plan includes more than only just a sub account as an additional service: 1 Mastercard, an accountant access to the account, our Bookkeeping pack, 60 instant SEPA transfers / direct debits + 2 cashed checks, and many advanced features that you can all check on our pricing page: https://qonto.com/en/pricing?select-toggle=soloPlease know that this joining force has the goal to support companies and associations in its daily core business, but also in the growth on the European and German market.The more functional Qonto accounts have been developed as an "all-in-one" finance solution, offering an additional solution for the accounting tasks alongside the bank accounts. Our aim has been to help our customers reduce or even eliminate the cost of additional bookkeeping tool.You can select whichever pricing plan suits your needs and you can also change it whenever you want.If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us by email, chat, or phone.Have a good day.Nina - Care team
commentaire_text: now they forced me to go to qonto from penta. now they charging for the same service 50 more. before i paid 9,90 for the basic package with sub accounts. now they charging 19 just for having sub accounts. it feels like we are cheated or tricked

commentaire: Why continue to deposit your money in a bank that will use it to finance, among other things, fossil fuels, when GreenGot exists? This neo-bank has everything a great one has to offer, the user experience is simply perfect and the money deposited is secure. I use it on a daily basis and, in practice, nothing has changed compared to my old bank, except that basically everything has changed! Thanks to GreenGot for existing and to Maud's team for developing it.Pourquoi continuer à déposer son argent dans une banque qui l'utilisera pour financer, entre autres, les énergies fossiles, quand GreenGot existe ? Cette néo-banque a tout d'une grande, l'expérience utilisateur est simplement parfaite et l'argent déposé est sécurisé. Je l'utilise au quotidien et, en pratique, rien n'a changé par rapport à mon ancienne banque, sauf qu'au fond, tout a changé ! Merci à GreenGot d'exister et à l'équipe de Maud de la développer.
reponses: "Rien a changé mais tout a changé" c'est une bonne idée de slogan ça ! 🔥 Merci à vous, c'est grâce à nos membres que tout est possible. On se répète mais c'est si vrai ! L'union fait la force 💪🏻
commentaire_text: why continue to deposit your money in a bank that will use it to finance, among other things, fossil fuels, when greengot exists this neo bank has everything a great one has to offer, the user experience is simply perfect and the money deposited is secure. i use it on a daily basis and, in practice, nothing has changed compared to my old bank, except that basically everything has changed thanks to greengot for existing and to maud's team for developing it.pourquoi continuer à déposer son argent dans une banque qui l'utilisera pour financer, entre autres, les énergies fossiles, quand greengot existe cette néo banque a tout d'une grande, l'expérience utilisateur est simplement parfaite et l'argent déposé est sécurisé. je l'utilise au quotidien et, en pratique, rien n'a changé par rapport à mon ancienne banque, sauf qu'au fond, tout a changé merci à greengot d'exister et à l'équipe de maud de la développer.

titre_com: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois
commentaire: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois . Pour l instant pas de souci mais je trouve les réponses par mails un peu longue 2 a 3 jours . Paiement par carte le 6 juillet multiplie par 3 et à ce jour pas remboursé de la différence.pas de numéro service client . Dommage 😰 sinon rien a dire.
reponses: Bonjour,Merci d'avoir partagé votre expérience.Nous sommes navrés pour les délais de réponse. Nous nous efforçons de répondre sous un délai maximum de 24h ouvrées (hors week-end).Nous vous invitons à nous contacter au 01 76 35 02 95 pour toute difficulté rencontrée (joignable de 9h30 à 17h30).À votre disposition.
commentaire_text: compte ouvert il y a quelques mois . pour l instant pas de souci mais je trouve les réponses par mails un peu longue 2 a 3 jours . paiement par carte le 6 juillet multiplie par 3 et à ce jour pas remboursé de la différence.pas de numéro service client . dommage sinon rien a dire.

commentaire: Younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and I cannot deny this.However, I have rated it two (2) stars due to issues I encountered after making an early payment with the "reduce installment amount" option. Despite discussing this with customer service, the following month I was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately €30, but it was not reduced, and I still received the full amount.I await clarification as soon as possible, especially since Younited is aware that I have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.I urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.Sincerely,
reponses: Good morning,We thank you for taking the time to leave us a comment.We are delighted to have you among our customers, however, we are sorry to read that you are not fully satisfied with your Younited experience.We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we will do everything we can to ensure that your experience at Younited is optimal.Do not hesitate to send us any other comments as customer satisfaction is at the heart of our concerns.Have a great day,
commentaire_text: younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and i cannot deny this.however, i have rated it two 2 stars due to issues i encountered after making an early payment with the reduce installment amount option. despite discussing this with customer service, the following month i was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately 30, but it was not reduced, and i still received the full amount.i await clarification as soon as possible, especially since younited is aware that i have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.i urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.sincerely,

commentaire: Since the start of the relationship there was a complete lack of communication, leaving me to contact them constantly for anything to move forward. The whole process and lack of regard for the time of the customer is absurd. It's always you chasing them for information. On top of all that time wasted and frustrations, the end result is that they refuse to accept a legal document as proof of ID thus cancelling my account and not refunding the prepayment of their annual plan. THE WORST EXPERIENCE OVERALL!
reponses: Hello Andres,We read your review very carefully. We are very sorry for this comment. Indeed, we tried to assist you as best we could in the process of opening your account. However, as we have explained on several occasions, the document you provided is not among those accepted by Qonto (information also available on our website) and, for security reasons, we cannot admit any exceptions.  Regarding the refund, as you have already been informed, it has already been made via the stated payment method.  We have tried to contact you again without receiving any reply. If you have any questions, we remain at your disposal.Have a nice day.
commentaire_text: since the start of the relationship there was a complete lack of communication, leaving me to contact them constantly for anything to move forward. the whole process and lack of regard for the time of the customer is absurd. it's always you chasing them for information. on top of all that time wasted and frustrations, the end result is that they refuse to accept a legal document as proof of id thus cancelling my account and not refunding the prepayment of their annual plan. the worst experience overall
